title: Did Gwyneth Paltrow’s ‘Vagina Candle’ Explode in Woman’s Living Room?
subtitle: The Goop lifestyle line has paid more than $145,000 in settlements for misleading claims.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A “vagina” candle made by Gwyneth Paltrow’s beauty line, Goop, unexpectedly exploded after being lit by a British woman.
